lines.text: If you are satisifed with an answer, that just means you can't think of the next question.
I'm willing to leave my fate in the hands of the American criminal justice system. Sleep well, Professor Oliver.
You're now talking very heavy kink.
Ah, I also assume I'm talking very heavy dollars... if they actually exist.
If you've got the cash, anything your mind can conjure up can be made to exist.
